import React from 'react' import './Header.css' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {useStateValue} from "./StateProvider"; function Header() { const [{basket}, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const handleAuthentication = () => { } return (
{/* Logo */}
Hello {!user ? 'Guest' : user.email} {user ? 'Sign Out' : 'Sign In'}
Return & Order
Your Prime
{basket.length}
); } export default Header
